ACC.description: The estimated horizontal accuracy radius in meters of this location.

ALT.description: The altitude of this location in meters above the WGS84 reference ellipsoid.

BE.description: The bearing at the time of this location in degrees.

BEACC.description: The estimated bearing accuracy in degrees of this location.

MSLALT.description: The Mean Sea Level altitude of this location in meters.

MSLALTACC.description: The estimated Mean Sea Level altitude accuracy in meters.

SP.description: The speed at the time of this location in meters per second.

SPACC.description: The estimated speed accuracy in meters per second of this location.
